synopsis.text: After the events depicted in Link Joker-hen, Aichi and Kai are living peaceful lives until they are summoned in a dream by Takuto Tatsunagi. He informs them of an invite-only tournament called Messiah Scramble with a coveted prize - the Messiah card. This card is said to be the name of a savior heard of in a dream. At the same time, units have started mysteriously disappearing from Vanguard cards around the world. Aichi and Kai team up once more to confront the new threat to the peace, an enemy by the name of Ibuki Kouji. Their battle will determine the fate of Planet Cray itself. This movie serves as a prequel, leading up to the events of Legion Mate-hen and explaining Aichi's eventual disappearance.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
